Articles.Content:
Can someone use their ModuleManager code-fu to add an alternate mode to the Mark-55 radial engine to make it able to switch between using LFO and Monoprop? Considering we have the huge Mark3 monoprop tank we use for shuttles, this may make the Mark-55 more useful an engine.

You can base the ISP stats on the OT-10 Puff engine, but I feel it should provide the same amount of thrust using Monoprop, or maybe slightly less. 

Thank you in advance for your time and effort to make this mod.

Dropbox: [Thudmod.cfg](https://www.dropbox.com/s/tu3qb028gniahew/Thudmod.cfg?dl=0)

The Mk. 68 "Chunk" Multi-Modal Engine produces 100 thrust in Monoprop mode at the same ISP as the OT-10 Puff, which is 20 less than it provides in LOX mode which was unchanged from the original.
